animeDescription: Farm life has never been this wacky. Where else could you find a turtle with a built in TV under his shell, a bald lion, an elephant whose trunk doubles as a garden hose and an inflatable octopus. All run by a good-natured ox named Olly.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Sasagawa Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Watanabe Jun', ['Sound Director']], ['Wyner Tom', ['Script']], ["Koorogi '73", ['Theme Song Performance']]]
